TEXT.TITLE: DATA ARCHITECTS <DRCH> GETS TOKYO BANK CONTRACT
TEXT.BODY: Data Architects Inc said it received a contract from the <Bank of Tokyo> to expand the installation of its bank electronic support systems at the bank. It said the contract exceeds one mln dlrs. Reuter
